posts.body: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma â€“ which is living with the results of other people's thinking.

posts.body: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
posts.author: Walt Disney

posts.body: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

posts.body: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
posts.author: Aristotle
